summary.para: Fills a tensor with the given constant Value. This operator performs the following pseudocode.
summary.code: for each coordinate in OutputTensor OutputTensor[coordinate] = Value endfor

member.name: DML_FILL_VALUE_CONSTANT_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The tensor to write the results to. This tensor may have any size.

member.name: DML_FILL_VALUE_CONSTANT_OPERATOR_DESC.ValueDataType
member.summary: The data type of the Value field, which must match OutputTensor.DataType.

member.name: DML_FILL_VALUE_CONSTANT_OPERATOR_DESC.Value
member.summary: A constant value to fill the output, with ValueDataType determining how to interpret the field.
